name: Sit 'N Sustain
description:
------ About ------

Sit 'N Sustain is a survival point and click indie game where you play the role as a teenage boy stuck by a campfire in the wilderness. Due to this, you must use the shop provided to buy items that will help you Sit 'N Sustain for as many days as possible.

------ Gameplay ------

Purchase items from the shop to defend yourself against the forces of nature and help yourself heal as well.

Get your own high scores! Share between yourself and friends!

------More Info------

This game was made for a 2021 Christmas release.

- Demo Published on September 27, 2021

- Full Game Published on December 25, 2021

------Credits------

Game Made By: Scott Zimmerman (2021)

This game was inspired by Sit 'N Survive by Scott Cawthon.

This game was made using Scratch!
